flavor_text_entries.red:
Very smart and
very vengeful.
Grabbing one of its many tails
could result in a
1000-year curse.
flavor_text_entries.blue:
Very smart and
very vengeful.
Grabbing one of its many tails
could result in a
1000-year curse.
flavor_text_entries.yellow:
According to an
enduring legend,
9 noble saints were united and
reincarnated as
this POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.gold:
Some legends claim
that each of its
nine tails has its own unique type
of special
mystical power.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
Its nine beautiful
tails are filled
with a wondrous energy that could
keep it alive for
1,000 years.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
It is said to live
a thousand years,
and each of its tails is loaded
with supernatural
powers.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
NINETALES casts a sinister light from
its bright red eyes to gain total
control over its foe’s mind. This POKéMON is said to live for a
thousand years.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
Legend has it that NINETALES came into
being when nine wizards possessing
sacred powers merged into one. This POKéMON is highly intelligent - it
can understand human speech.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
It has long been said that each of the
nine tails embody an enchanted power.
A long-lived NINETALES will have fur that
shines like gold.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
It has nine long tails and fur that 
gleams gold. It is said to live for 
1,000 years.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing
one of its many tails could result in a
1,000-year curse.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
Its nine tails are said to be
imbued with a mystic power.
It can live for a thousand years.
flavor_text_entries.pearl:
Its nine tails are said to be
imbued with a mystic power.
It can live for a thousand years.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
Its nine tails are said to be
imbued with a mystic power.
It can live for a thousand years.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold:
Some legends claim that each of its
nine tails has its own unique type
of special mystical power.
flavor_text_entries.soulsilver:
Its nine beautiful tails are filled
with a wondrous energy that could
keep it alive for 1,000 years.
flavor_text_entries.black:
Its nine tails are said to be
imbued with a mystic power.
It can live for a thousand years.
flavor_text_entries.white:
Its nine tails are said to be
imbued with a mystic power.
It can live for a thousand years.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
Each of its nine tails is imbued
with supernatural power, and it
can live for a thousand years.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
Each of its nine tails is imbued
with supernatural power, and it
can live for a thousand years.
flavor_text_entries.x:
It has nine long tails and fur that gleams gold.
It is said to live for 1,000 years.
flavor_text_entries.y:
Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its
many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Ninetales casts a sinister light from its bright red eyes to gain
total control over its foe’s mind. This Pokémon is said to live
for a thousand years.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Legend has it that Ninetales came into being when
nine wizards possessing sacred powers merged into one.
This Pokémon is highly intelligent—it can understand
human speech.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
Legend has it that this mystical Pokémon was
formed when nine saints coalesced into one.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
Said to live for a thousand years, this Pokémon
uses its supernatural abilities to manipulate fire.
It can burn its prey to a crisp as it pleases.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
It is vindictive and relentless by nature.
Those who cross it even once will be cursed for
a thousand years, along with their descendants.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
The flickering flames it spews from its mouth
leave its opponents hypnotized. Then, this
extremely intelligent Pokémon attacks.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu:
According to an enduring legend, nine noble
saints were united and reincarnated
as this Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-eevee:
According to an enduring legend, nine noble
saints were united and reincarnated
as this Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails
is loaded with supernatural powers.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of
its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.
flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
The coat of gleaming golden fur is quite magnificent.
This species is said to store sacred power in its nine long tails
and to live for a millennium.
